milestone.title: 5. Regional-Manager/Coordinator Features ("Full Roster Control")
milestone.description:
Since the Coordinators and Program Managers bring additional requirements related to performance, search, and scrolling views, this milestone is for tracking this work. Some features may be prioritized after a basic Coach task

Examples:
Session Duration support
Calendar View makes navigation easier (low)
Sorted and paginated list views
Performance enhancements
Analytics for the Region

milestone.title: Coach App Passes UAT (iOS v 1.3+)
milestone.description:
The milestone is met when:
PART I:
Hamza, Yuri and a Coach can use the basic features to
Login
Take Attendance
Manage enrollments
Multiple times, whenever they need to update it
PART II:
*In-Service Group is selected and managed by the Program team. e.g. "San Rafael Coaches"
* UA Testing is provided by Program Leaders Yuri and Hamza

title: (MVP) Coach can complete an attendance update for an existing roster in a current session

milestone.title: 5. Regional-Manager/Coordinator Features ("Full Roster Control")
milestone.description:
Since the Coordinators and Program Managers bring additional requirements related to performance, search, and scrolling views, this milestone is for tracking this work. Some features may be prioritized after a basic Coach task

Examples:
Session Duration support
Calendar View makes navigation easier (low)
Sorted and paginated list views
Performance enhancements
Analytics for the Region

title: Coach can modify session properties and schedule

milestone.title: 7. Coach Can Set Up a New Team-Season to Track Directly in the App

title: Coach can add a new team and team season

milestone.title: 3. Pre-Launch Functionality Accessible by All Coaches
milestone.description:
Criteria:
Team views based includes all Program Staff types
View defaults to active season
Support for AppleID signin (required by Apple)
App supports dynamic session values
Coach can set/change Session date and Type in app
Coach prompted when to refresh

title: Once a coach successfully authenticates with a build, their login should be automatic
